title: Keen 4 - hidden level?
content: Does anybody know the way to the Pyramide of Forbidden? Thx

title: Re: Keen 4 - hidden level?
content:
Yes. Go to the Pyramid of Moons, get the yellow key. Now go to the one room with all of the inchworms on the floor. Use the yellow key on the door to the right. Theres a switch behind it. Flip the switch. Now you have to get all 12 inchworms to gather around you. Once they are all there, a giant foot will appear. Jump up into it to go to the secret level.-Genius314
[url=http://planetck.spatang.com]PlanetCK[/url]

title: Re: Keen 4 - hidden level?
content:
